sentence.Network_en: In her view, war is simply a legalised form of butchery.
sentence.Network_cn: 在她看来，战争只不过是一种合法化的屠杀。

sentence.Network_en: Instead of meeting , we be vegetarian. Tolstoy once said: Where there is butchery, there is battlefield.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们更应坚持素食, 托尔斯泰曾说过: 只要有屠场, 就会有战场.

sentence.Network_en: Butchery: Will now always grant 20 runic power, regardless of the creature type killed.
sentence.Network_cn: 杀戮: 总是给予20点符文能量, 不管杀死的是什么生物类型.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (denoting a slaughterhouse or meat market): from Old French boucherie, from bouchier 'butcher'

entry.def: You can refer to the cruel killing of a lot of people as butchery when you want to express your horror and disgust at this.

example.ex: In her view, war is simply a legalised form of butchery.
example.tran: 在她看来，战争只不过是一种合法化的屠杀。

entry.def: Butchery is the work of cutting up meat and preparing it for sale.

means.word_mean: 1. a building where animals are butchered
3. the savage and excessive killing of many people
